context.summary: Sue from Wallend-Air following up about paragliding course in January 2026 for 3 people. She shared course info document and training videos from the Garden Route in South Africa. Alexis expressed interest and requested details to forward to the group.

pendingActions.action: Review paragliding course details and decide on January 2026 booking

recentMessages.text: Hi Alexis, following up with you re: joining our paragliding course in January 2026.
Hi Alexis, here is our course info doc.  Have a read and let me know if you have any queries.
Hi Sue! Thanks for getting in touch! Yes, we have 3 people keen to get licence. Could you send me some details that I could forward in our group?
